channel.title: Actual Coords of wild?
channel.description: Does anyone know the coords for safezone where everything is safe besides wild? -Thanks in advance

item.title: Actual Coords of wild?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

I have mine. but it’s still wild in areas that have coords such as 9000+ or 4000+ (usually lower levels or higher levels). Let me post the coords.

Alright, this should work. I did it a while back, so im not sure i have it all. Although I’m pretty sure i labeled them so I’d remember.

|| (absX >= 2946 && absX <= 3331 && absY >= 3105 && absY <= 3523) // free non wild || (absX >= 2160 && absX <= 2946 && absY >= 3072 && absY <= 3838) // mem west non wild || (absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3519 && absY >= 2816 && absY <= 3523) // mem southeast non wild || (absX >= 3384 && absX <= 3711 && absY >= 3524 && absY <= 3583) // mem northeast non wild

just add those in so it works.

Lol, btw, that actually took me a long ass time to get those coords. So you better thank me that i got them ;]

Read full topic
